product_name: Sea to Summit Garment Mesh Bag - Medium
long_description: Pack and organize multiple shirts or shorts with the medium Sea to Summit Garment mesh bag, which is made of ultralight, tough fabric to withstand frequent travel. Lightweight and water-resistant Ultra-Sil(TM) fabric made with Cordura(R) nylon yarn stands up to the rigors of travel. Breathable mesh top makes for easy viewing; bag lays flat when empty for hassle-free storage. Perimeter zippers allow full access to contents; top haul handle makes it easy to pull bag out from bottom of a pack or simply carry from point to point.
short_description: Pack and organize multiple shirts or shorts with the medium Sea to Summit Garment mesh bag, which is made of ultralight, tough fabric to withstand frequent travel.
